languages.text: {n}Верхняя губа Волка хищно задирается, в глазах загорается кровавый азарт. Он будто становится выше и темнее, а с его уст срывается:{/n} "Я долго ждал этого, трусливый прихвостень ничтожных владык. И братья мои ждали. Сейчас ты будешь умирать. Долго умирать".

traits.locale_text: [даже пытаться не буду — Леша, напиши тут витиеватое оскорбление]

languages.text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."
languages.original_text: {n}Верхняя губа Волка хищно задирается, в глазах загорается кровавый азарт. Он будто становится выше и темнее, а с его уст срывается:{/n} "Я долго ждал этого, трусливый прихвостень ничтожных владык. И братья мои ждали. Сейчас ты будешь умирать. Долго умирать".

And your death will be long."

languages.text: {n}La lèvre supérieure du Wolf se soulève en un rictus animal, et une excitation féroce enflamme son regard. La silhouette d'Ulfar semble grandir et s'assombrir à vue d'œil, tandis qu'il lance :{/n} « Voilà longtemps que j'attendais cela, vil serviteur de maîtres insignifiants. Il en est de même pour mes frères. L'heure de votre mort a sonné. Elle sera lente et douloureuse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."

traits.locale_text: {n}La lèvre supérieure du Wolf se soulève en un rictus animal, et une excitation féroce enflamme son regard. La silhouette d'Ulfar semble grandir et s'assombrir à vue d'œil, tandis qu'il lance :{/n} « Voilà longtemps que j'attendais cela, vil serviteur de maîtres insignifiants. Il en est de même pour mes frères. L'heure de votre mort a sonné. Elle sera lente et douloureuse. »

languages.text: {n}ウルフの上唇がプレデターのような唸り声を上げ、その目に獰猛な興奮が宿っている。ウルファーの姿は、彼が言葉を発するにつれて大きく、そして暗くなっていくように見える。{/n}「俺は長い間、これを待っていた。兄弟たちも同じだ。ここでお前は死を迎える。お前は苦しみながらゆっくりと死ぬだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルフの上唇がプレデターのような唸り声を上げ、その目に獰猛な興奮が宿っている。ウルファーの姿は、彼が言葉を発するにつれて大きく、そして暗くなっていくように見える。{/n}「俺は長い間、これを待っていた。兄弟たちも同じだ。ここでお前は死を迎える。お前は苦しみながらゆっくりと死ぬだろう」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法扬起上唇，发出了充满掠食意味的咆哮，目光中闪烁着凶狠的兴奋。他的身型似乎变得越来越大，越来越凶狠。{/n}“这一刻我已经等了很久了，我的兄弟们也已经等了很久了。你这懦弱的仆从，侍奉你那些该死的主人。现在就是你的死期，我打算好好折磨折磨你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法扬起上唇，发出了充满掠食意味的咆哮，目光中闪烁着凶狠的兴奋。他的身型似乎变得越来越大，越来越凶狠。{/n}“这一刻我已经等了很久了，我的兄弟们也已经等了很久了。你这懦弱的仆从，侍奉你那些该死的主人。现在就是你的死期，我打算好好折磨折磨你。”

languages.text: {n}Die Oberlippe des Wolfs verzieht sich bedrohlich, und wilde Gier blitzt in seinen Augen auf. Ulfar scheint größer und dunkler zu werden, als er sagt:{/n} "Lange habe ich darauf gewartet, feiger Scherge verachtenswerter Meister. Und auch meine Brüder haben das. Nun begegnet Ihr Eurem Tod. Und Euer Tod wird lang sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Oberlippe des Wolfs verzieht sich bedrohlich, und wilde Gier blitzt in seinen Augen auf. Ulfar scheint größer und dunkler zu werden, als er sagt:{/n} "Lange habe ich darauf gewartet, feiger Scherge verachtenswerter Meister. Und auch meine Brüder haben das. Nun begegnet Ihr Eurem Tod. Und Euer Tod wird lang sein."

languages.text: {n}El Lobo Espacial levanta el labio superior y gruñe como un depredador; una feroz expresión de entusiasmo centellea en sus ojos. La figura de Ulfar parece agrandarse y oscurecerse mientras murmura entre dientes:{/n} «Largo tiempo he deseado esto, cobarde lacayo de amos despreciables. Igual que mis hermanos. Aquí es donde hallarás la muerte. Y no será rápida».
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo Espacial levanta el labio superior y gruñe como un depredador; una feroz expresión de entusiasmo centellea en sus ojos. La figura de Ulfar parece agrandarse y oscurecerse mientras murmura entre dientes:{/n} «Largo tiempo he deseado esto, cobarde lacayo de amos despreciables. Igual que mis hermanos. Aquí es donde hallarás la muerte. Y no será rápida».

languages.text: {n}Kurt'un üst dudağı yırtıcı bir hırıltıyla kalkıyor ve gözleri, vahşi bir heyecanla dolu ışıklar saçıyor. Ulfar'ın biçimi konuştukça daha büyük ve daha karanlık bir hâl alıyor gibi:{/n} "Aşağılık efendilerinin ödlek piyonu, bu anı uzun zamandır bekliyordum. Kardeşlerim de öyle. Ölümünle burada tanışacaksın. Ve bu ölüm, uzun sürecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Wolf's upper lip lifts in a predatory snarl, and ferocious excitement flashes in his eyes. Ulfar's form seems to grow larger and darker as he utters,{/n} "Long have I waited for this, craven minion of derisible masters. And so have my brothers. This is where you meet your death. And your death will be long."
